evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief
evidence.text: AFSA has been certified by the Foreign Service Labor Relations Board as the exclusive representative of approximately 18,000 active duty members of the Foreign Service employed by the Department of State and the U.S. Agency for International Development (“USAID”), as well as the Foreign Commercial Service (“FCS”) in the Department of Commerce, Foreign Agricultural Service (“AFS”), Animal and Plant Health Inspection Service (“APHIS”) in the Department of Agriculture, and U.S. Agency for Global Media (“USAGM”).
